TEMP ← SRC1;
MASK ← SRC2;
DEST ← 0 ;
m← 0, k← 0;
DO WHILE m< OperandSize
    IF MASK[ m] = 1 THEN
        DEST[ m] ← TEMP[ k];
        k ← k + 1;
    FI
    m ← m+ 1;
OD

if((mask >> m) & 1)
{

}

    000000000000000000000000000000001100 12
    000000000000000000000000000000101011 43
    000000000000000000000000000000000000 0
m = 0, k = 0 (init)

    000000000000000000000000000000001100 12
    000000000000000000000000000000101011 43
    000000000000000000000000000000000000 0
m = 0, k = 0

    000000000000000000000000000000001100 12
    000000000000000000000000000000101011 43
    000000000000000000000000000000000000 0
m = 1, k = 1

    000000000000000000000000000000001100 12
    000000000000000000000000000000101011 43
    000000000000000000000000000000000000 0
m = 2, k = 1

    000000000000000000000000000000001100 12
    000000000000000000000000000000101011 43
    000000000000000000000000000000001000 8
m = 3, k = 2
((temp >> k) | 0)*((1 << (m+k))
    000000000000000000000000000000001100 12  ((temp >> k) | 0) := y
    000000000000000000000000000000101011 43
    000000000000000000000000000000001000 8   dest += y*((1 << (m+k))
m = 4, k = 2

    000000000000000000000000000000001100 12
    000000000000000000000000000000101011 43
    000000000000000000000000000000101000 40
m = 5, k = 3
